document.full_text: valero energy corp's and motiva enterprises refineries in st. charles parish louisiana, west of new orleans, will be flooded if the morganza spillway is not opened, the st. charles parish emergency preparedness director said on wednesday.
document.title: louisiana refineries to flood without spillway: official
lines_and_colors: valero energy corp's and motiva enterprises refineries in st. charles parish louisiana, west of new orleans, will be flooded if the morganza spillway is not opened, the st. charles parish emergency preparedness director said on wednesday.
